name: Quetzalcoatl
flavorText: The Oaxazi tribe sends promising children into the deep jungle to be judged by the great feathered serpent. Those who return are trained in the sacred arts.
flavorTextHtml: The Oaxazi tribe sends promising children into the deep jungle to be judged by the great feathered serpent. Those who return are trained in the sacred arts.

secondary.textHtml: Locust Swarm and Haunt now deal their damage in half of the normal duration.
secondary.text: Locust Swarm and Haunt now deal their damage in half of the normal duration.
